section.title: Free WordPress Plugin
section.para: TubePress can be installed and activated just like any other WordPress plugin. See the WordPress docs on plugin management for more information. For the impatient, here are the steps...

listitem.para: Unzip into your plugins directory at (wp-content/plugins)
Activate TubePress from Site Admin > Plugins
Configure from Site Admin > Settings > TubePress
Type [tubepress] in a post or a page where you'd like to insert your gallery (this is actually the simplest form of a TubePress shortcode). See the image below for an example.

section.title: TubePress Pro

listitem.simpara: After you purchase TubePress Pro, check your email that you've registered with PayPal. You'll find an email that contains your download link. When you click on this link, your web browser will prompt you to download (or open) a zip file containing TubePress Pro. Click "Save file" and download the zip file to somewhere easy to find, like your desktop.
listitem.para: As of this writing, the name of the zip file is tubepress_pro_1_9_0.zip.
Unzip the file you just downloaded (tubepress_pro_1_9_0.zip). It will expand into a directory named tubepress_pro_1_9_0.
Optional. Install ShadowBox and JW FLV Media Player support. Installation instructions for these libraries can be found in .

note.simpara: Non-WordPress users - don't be alarmed if you see references to WordPress code in your download. There are WordPress-specific files that allow TubePress Pro users to use the software in a WordPress environment if they choose to. This extra code will have absolutely no impact on the functionality or performance of TubePress Pro.

section.simpara: The last step in the installation, found below, depend on whether you're using TubePress Pro in WordPress or not.

section.title: Standalone PHP
section.para: If you will be using TubePress Pro outside of a WordPress environment, upload the entire tubepress_pro_1_9_0 directory to your web server in a place that's web accessible. Make a note of:

listitem.para: the full path of this directory on your web server's filesystem (e.g. /var/www/html/myblog.com/lib/tubepress_pro_1_9_0)
the web-accessible URL to reach this directory (e.g. http://myblog.com/lib/tubepress_pro_1_9_0)

section.para: Now you're ready to start integrating TubePress Pro into your site.

section.title: WordPress
section.para: If you will be using TubePress Pro inside a WordPress environment, just install the TubePress Pro directory into wp-content/plugins as you would any other WordPress Plugin. Then start adding galleries to your posts and pages and/or templates.
